1.content:
Sora was getting ready to leave the Small Island for the evening and head home. Before he did though he figured he'd check the Secret Place, just to make sure everything was still fine. Everything was fine, but as he turned to leave something glinted in the corner of his eye. Deciding to take a closer look Sora approached the glinting object. On closer inspection it was revealed to be a crystal, kind of like a gummi only clear.

The moment Sora grabbed the crystal a powerful bolt of static leapt to his hands and when he looked again he saw the crystal was gone. "What just happened?" he asked to nobody in particular. Shrugging it off he headed for his boat and began making his way back to the main island.

What next?
1.title: Enchanted!

11.content:
Sora saw a bright flash, of dazzling blue light. it was blinding, truly bright. When it was over, sora was feeling dizzy, he counldnt find his bearings for a while, but eventually got there. "Woah, err, what just happened?" sora said, still stunned. " well, whatever it was, its over now. I'd best get home"

"I really can't get over how pretty Kairi is... i really wonder what it would feel like to be her, even if it was just for a day..."

info.brief_description: Sora is accidentally enchanted with the ability to morph and body swap.
info.description:
(Post-KHII)

Sora finds a strange crystal in the Secret Place and gains the ability to morph and swap bodies. What havoc and fun can this cause on Destiny Islands?

Ability description:

Morph: Changes shape, but not powers. So he could look like Riku, buthe'd still wield his own Keyblade and not the Way to Dawn.

Swap: Switches bodies and therefore Sora gets the powers of the body he's in. However he can't morph while swapped and has to at least be looking at the swappee.

Characters (All in KH2 clothes):

Sora (Main)
Age: 15
Athletic, tanned, brown hair, blue eyes... if you know Kingdom Hearts than you know what he looks like.

Riku
Age: 16
Leanly muscular, platinum hair, teal eyes, again if you know KH you know what he looks like. For the purposes of this interactive he's had a bit of a haircut since KH2.

Kairi
Age: 15
Reddish-brown hair, athletic, blue eyes, same as the above two, you should know who she is.

Selphie
Age: 14
Brown hair, athletic, green eyes, you can invent her 'KH2 outfit'.

Wakka
Age: 16
Red hair, muscular, brown eyes, free control over his 'KH2 outfit'

Tidus
Age: 14
Blond hair, athletic, teal eyes, again free control over 'KH2 outfit'

Roxas and Namine are also sort of characters given that they're part of Sora and Kairi. Either way they're viable full-morph options. You can add other characters as you see fit.

Rules:
1. Third-person perspective.
2. Try not to make it all slash please. Not saying you can't do them, just try to keep it under control. Canon couples can be just as fun.
3. Don't get too descriptive with sex please.
4. Try to use good spelling and grammar. We're not perfect, I know, but don't type in script format, in l33t or in text message type.

Can't think of anything else to add here. Remember Destiny Islands is not just the little island from the first game, it also includes the much larger island seen briefly in the second game.
